document_data.name: Pride of Nobanion
document_data.mainbody: '''''Pride of Nobanion''''' was a [[Divine magic|divine]] [[conjuration]] [[spell]] used by specialty priests devoted to [[Nobanion]] called [[Firemane]]s, enabling them to summon [[feline]] aid.
document_data.Effects: This spell allowed the caster to call a number of great cats within {{SI|1|mi|k}} to their side, drawing the strongest specimens available. The great cats would aid the caster in their predicament and then wander away back into the wild.
document_data.Components: This spell required only [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s to cast.
